application.domain

Class TempHandImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • application.domain.TempHandImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TempHand, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class TempHandImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements java.io.Serializable, TempHand
    A number of variables that are only needed every turn are stored here temporarily.
    Author:
    Kees
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
